description: This file contains the dialog for the solids and liquids who are at war

solids.1: We've been waiting a long time for this day, we are SICK and TIRED of sharing the kitchen with the liquids

liquids.1: The solids need to get brought down a few pegs..
liquids.2: We will no longer tolerate those solidified fools
liquids.3: The solids need to get brought down a few pegs..
